description: Immutable, mission-critical scalar parameters governing P-01 viability margins and primary system safety thresholds (S-02, S-01 index correlation).

VIABILITY_CORE.group_description: Parameters dictating the required buffer for sustained P-01 operation.

viability_margin_epsilon.note: Minimum operational buffer for transient input factor stabilization.

SAFETY_BOUNDARY.group_description: Thresholds limiting risk exposure relative to validated viability indexes.

safety_override_threshold_s02_max.note: S-02 risk exposure must never exceed this fraction of the S-01 viability index.
